title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Live hallucination detection in prod with LaunchDarkly’s AI Configs (AIM258)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 LaunchDarkly 的 AI Configs 在生产环境中进行实时幻觉检测 (AIM258)
abstract: When bringing generative AI applications to production, accuracy is key. LaunchDarkly's AI Configs give you the flexibility to change your generative AI applications at runtime, so you can measure model performance more effectively in a real-world setting. In this session, we'll walk through a simplified RAG implementation of an insurance chatbot using an Amazon Bedrock knowledge base. You'll see a demo of how this chatbot uses LaunchDarkly AI Evals to detect hallucinations in production. We'll also cover how to collect metrics such as latency and cost, and discuss strategies for building guardrail logic directly into your runtime configuration. This presentation is brought to you by LaunchDarkly, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 在将生成式AI应用投入生产时,准确性至关重要。LaunchDarkly的AI Configs为您提供了在运行时更改生成式AI应用的灵活性,使您能够在真实环境中更有效地衡量模型性能。在本次会议中,我们将演示一个使用Amazon Bedrock知识库的保险聊天机器人的简化RAG实现。您将看到该聊天机器人如何使用LaunchDarkly AI Evals在生产环境中检测幻觉的演示。我们还将介绍如何收集延迟和成本等指标,并讨论将护栏逻辑直接构建到运行时配置中的策略。本演示由AWS合作伙伴LaunchDarkly为您呈现。
